DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating MST-997 Advanced Malignant Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis malignant solid tumor measurable disease Life expectancy least 12 week ECOG ( Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ) performance status 0,1 , 2 Recent major surgery , radiation therapy anticancer treatment History prior malignancy within last 5 year
